title: Quantum Computing Applications in Healthcare
problem_statement: Quantum computing promises breakthroughs in drug discovery and medical data analysis. However, the feasibility of real-world applications in healthcare is uncertain.
key_questions: Which healthcare problems can quantum computing realistically solve?
What technical limitations exist in applying quantum algorithms?
How do ethical and privacy issues affect adoption?
method_brief: Review of current quantum healthcare research
Interviews with biotech and pharma experts
Feasibility analysis of quantum drug simulations
